name: Wash your hands often with soap
description: Lather your hands by rubbing them together with the soap. Lather the backs of your hands, between your fingers, and under your nails.

name: Avoid touching your eyes, nose, mouth
description: Hands touch many surfaces and can pick up viruses. Once contaminated, hands can transfer the virus to your eyes, nose or mouth.

name: Avoid contact with people who are sick
description: Avoid close contact with people who are sick. If possible, maintain 6 feet between the person who is sick and other household members.

name: Stay home if you are sick
description: Do not leave your home, except to get medical care. Do not visit public areas. Take care of yourself. Get rest and stay hydrated.

name: You should wear a facemask
description: Wearing a medical mask can help limit the spread of some respiratory diseases. However using a mask alone is not guaranteed to stop infections.

name: Donâ€™t Touch Your Face or Nose
description: To help prevent infections, keep your hands away from your eyes, nose, and mouth especially during the COVID-19 pandemic.
